r.s: Tool to generate PECL extensions from an XML description
r.d: CodeGen_PECL (formerly known as PECL_Gen) is a pure PHP replacement for the ext_skel shell script that comes with the PHP 4 source. It reads in configuration options, function prototypes and code fragments from an XML description file and generates a complete ready-to-compile PECL extension.
r.n: Changes since 1.1.0: - added appropriate ZEND_ACC_... attributes for __construct/__destruct/__clone - implemented nested <group> tag support - add generic "unknown" author if none specified to ensure valid package.xml - fixed PROP_SET_STRING to actually use the stringl api function instead of the plain string one - fixed handling of optional parameters in prototypes
